title: Penne with fresh tomatoes and sweetcorn
ingredients: ['1/2 (500g) pack penne', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '75g (3 oz) frozen sweetcorn, cooked', '4 tomatoes, chopped', '3 spring onions, chopped', 'salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', 'handful chopped fresh basil']
